title: Electrocardiographic and biochemical predictors of left ventricular remodeling early after ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction
details: M Doğan, U Canpolat, K Aytemir - Future Cardiology, 2024
abstract: Aim: We aimed to assess low to mid-range left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) predictors at one-month follow-up in STEMI patients using baseline electrocardiography (ECG) and standard laboratory tests. Methods: In this …
